page.title: 10MOORING AT SCORAIG
page.content: TO GET ACROSS THE LOCH FROM SCORAIG YOU NEED A BOAT.MOST PEOPLE THERE HAVE A BOAT.NEARLY ALL THE BOATS ARE 14foot CLINKER BUILT.ALTHOUGH SOME PEOPLE OWN A BOAT,MOST PEOPLE SHARE A"MOORING BOAT",BUT NOT ALL HAVE A SHARE IN THE YAMAHA ENGINE. THE "RUNNING MOORING" WORKS WITH A LONG ENDLESS ROPE THREADED THROUGH A PULLEY WHICH IS ANCHORED ABOUT 10metre OFF THE END OF THE JETTY.THERE IS AN "EYE" SPLICED INTO THE ROPE ON WHICH TO ATTACH THE BOAT,SO THAT IT CAN BE PULLED OUT TO THE ANCHOR. THE BOAT IS SAFER OUT THERE BECAUSE WHEN IT IS OUT IT HAS LESS CHANCE OF GETTING BASHED ON THE ROCKS. THERE IS ALSO AN ENDLESS MOORING SHARED BY MOST PEOPLE,AT THE BADLUARACH JETTY.
